backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lookup file containing brief descriptions of key frontend modules.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS theme variables defining a color system and base styles using Tailwind layers.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the ShimCalculatorPage.
frontend/src/components/ShimQuantityTabl: Interactive table for editing shim quantities and showing per-color subtotals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks; currently unused.
frontend/src/index.css: Warm-themed Tailwind CSS variables and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/formatMm.ts: Utility functions for formatting millimeter values and computing total or subtotal thickness.
frontend/src/lib/shimData.ts: Hardcoded list of shim colors with their thickness values and display colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with react-query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ShimCalculatorPage.ts: Implements the shim calculator page with quantity state, total thickness calculation, reset functionality, and UI layout.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, fonts, plugins, and container settings for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the project's metadata, feature list, requirements, and current state for the shim calculator app.
